Posts.Content: Hi Nuff, I wanted to extend a welcome to you, I'm sorry I missed your original post. Also - we have a small group formed that have quit dates nearing so we can quit together. There's plenty of room in the DIRTY SECRET thread if you'd like to join us. I love your attitude! KC
Posts.Title: Thanks everyone!

Posts.Content: I'm so sorry & I hope your counselor helps you find peace with this. From another angle: Your hair loss is an awesome bench mark for you! A couple of weeks ago you were preparing, dreading, waiting for it to happen. Now, it's here & soon to be behind you. I had myself so psyched up about losing my hair that by day 14 when I wasn't, I wondered why not and was relieved when it went. And, then I checked it off the checklist and focused on the next. Benchmarks have been a great tool for me, maybe they can help you, too. It's not about how many are left. It's about how many I've left behind.
Posts.Title: Hair loss is getting me down

Posts.Content: ROFL!!! Now, plz excuse me while I wipe soda spray off of my desk & monitor...
Posts.Title: To perhaps relieve some ambivalence...

Posts.Content: That's wonderful, Susan! SO happy for you. ...and thank you for sharing - it is an inspiration for those of us trudging behind on the trail you've helped to clear for us! Warm Hugs, KC
Posts.Title: To perhaps relieve some ambivalence...

Posts.Content: No, I apologize that I somehow made you feel as if you needed to. I just wanted to give you a heads up that there was another thread out there that might have additional information...and maybe you had already seen it. Sorry. KC
